author: SolutionsWP
description: A lightweight, eCommerce-focused WordPress plugin designed to help store owners increase conversions through popups, opt-ins, lead capture, behavioral targeting, and actionable insights.
changelog:
## Bug Fixes

- Fixed admin menu visibility issue - menu now appears correctly in WordPress admin
- Changed custom capabilities to standard WordPress capabilities
- Fixed hook timing issue where AdminMenu was initialized too late
- All admin menu items now use manage_options capability

See https://github.com/solutionswp/convertlab/releases for full changelog
